main.value: Specify which resource contains all the forms built with FormBlocks.
Enable or disable the option to save each form submission in the database. The saved forms can be accessed from the top menu through Extras > FormIt.

linear.value:
Below you will find the settings for referencing the ContentBlocks fields containing the various form inputs.

Please note that you have to fill in the ID of the ContentBlocks field here, not their chunk ID!

Yes, I've been there.. A little too long ;)

Also note that these settings are referenced by the fbEmailRow chunks that generate the rows inside the email template. These chunks are not part of the pattern library, because the CB field ID is part of their chunk name but that ID can differ per installation, if you install through the RomanescoPatterns GPM package. You don't have to worry about this if you installed the full Romanesco MODX installation though.
